mapper.insert: insert into sales_detail (salesdetailcode, status, price, establishcode, salescode, jukyo) values (#{salesdetailcode},#{status},#{price},#{establishcode},#{salescode} ,#{jukyo})
mapper.select: select salesdetailcode, status, price, establishcode, salescode, jukyo from sales_detail
select salesdetailcode, status, price, establishcode, salescode, jukyo from sales_detail where salesdetailcode = #{salesdetailcode}
